price: Berkatalah orang-orang yang kafir, "Apakah setelah kita menjadi tanah dan (begitu pula) bapak-bapak kita; apakah sesungguhnya kita akan dikeluarkan (dari kubur)?
arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓاْ أَءِذَا كُنَّا تُرَٰبٗا وَءَابَآؤُنَآ أَئِنَّا لَمُخۡرَجُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waqāla alladhīna kafarū a-idhā kunnā turāban waābāunā a-innā lamukh'rajūna
